Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=2.1 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=32 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=28 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Displays antimicrobial activity against bacteria and yeast C. albicans.

Literature.Title: IQ-motif peptides as novel anti-microbial agents.
Literature.Author: McLean DT, Lundy FT, Timson DJ.
